control.name: buttonsSelection
control.description: The 'All' button selects the entire editor's content. The 'Random' button selects text at random. The 'Clear' button clears the current selection.

control.name: checkEditHideSelection
control.description: This check box allows you to specify whether the selection is hidden when focus is moved to another control.

control.name: comboBoxSelectCase
control.description: This combo box allows you to select the case for characters and apply it to the editor's content.

control.name: comboBoxPasswordChar
control.description: This combo box allows you to select the password character. This character will be displayed instead of actual characters.

control.name: comboNumericFormat
control.description: This combo box allows you to select the numeric format.

control.name: spinEditDecimalPlaces
control.description: This spin edit allows the number of decimal places to be specified.

control.name: comboNumericEditValue
control.description: This combo box allows you to select a value and assign it to the sample text editor.

control.name: comboDateFormat
control.description: This combo box allows you to select the date format.

control.name: dateEdit
control.description: This date editor allows you to select the desired date and assign it to the sample text editor.
